verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> concerning the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> or <S%H176><s%> swear <S%H7650><s%> an oath <S%H7621><s%> to bind <S%H631><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> with a bond; <S%H632><s%> he shall not break <S%H2490><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> he shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that proceeds <S%H3318><s%> out of his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

If a woman <S%H802><s%> also vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and bind <S%H631><s%> herself by a bond, <S%H632><s%> being in her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in her youth; <S%H5271><s%>

And her father <S%H1><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> her vow, <S%H5088><s%> and her bond <S%H632><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%> and her father <S%H1><s%> shall hold <S%H2790><s%> his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her; then all <S%H3605><s%> her vows <S%H5088><s%> shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> bond <S%H632><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> disallow <S%H5106><s%> her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he hears; <S%H8085><s%> not any <S%H3605><s%> of her vows, <S%H5088><s%> or of her bonds <S%H632><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%> shall stand: <S%H6965><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall forgive <S%H5545><s%> her, because <S%H3588><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> disallowed <S%H5106><s%> her.

And if <S%H518><s%> she had <S%H1961><s%> at all an husband, <S%H376><s%> when she vowed, <S%H5088><s%> or <S%H176><s%> uttered <S%H4008><s%> ought out of her lips, <S%H8193><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul; <S%H5315><s%>

And her husband <S%H376><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, and held <S%H2790><s%> his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> it: then her vows <S%H5088><s%> shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and her bonds <S%H632><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> disallowed <S%H5106><s%> her on the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> it; then he shall make her vow <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she vowed, <S%H5088><s%> and that which she uttered <S%H4008><s%> with her lips, <S%H8193><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%> of none <S%H6565><s%> effect: <S%H6565><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall forgive <S%H5545><s%> her.

But every vow <S%H5088><s%> of a widow, <S%H490><s%> and of her that is divorced, <S%H1644><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> they have bound <S%H631><s%> their souls, <S%H5315><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her.

And if <S%H518><s%> she vowed <S%H5087><s%> in her husband's <S%H376><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> or <S%H176><s%> bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> by a bond <S%H632><s%> with an oath; <S%H7621><s%>

And her husband <S%H376><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, and held <S%H2790><s%> his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her, and disallowed <S%H5106><s%> her not: then all <S%H3605><s%> her vows <S%H5088><s%> shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> bond <S%H632><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> has utterly made them void <S%H6565><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> he heard <S%H8085><s%> them; then whatever <S%H3605><s%> proceeded <S%H4161><s%> out of her lips <S%H8193><s%> concerning her vows, <S%H5088><s%> or concerning the bond <S%H632><s%> of her soul, <S%H5315><s%> shall not stand: <S%H6965><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> has made them void; <S%H6565><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall forgive <S%H5545><s%> her.

Every <S%H3605><s%> vow, <S%H5088><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> binding <S%H632><s%> oath <S%H7621><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> the soul, <S%H5315><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> may establish <S%H6965><s%> it, or her husband <S%H376><s%> may make it void. <S%H6565><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> altogether hold <S%H2790><s%> his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her from day <S%H3117><s%> to day; <S%H3117><s%> then he establishes <S%H6965><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> her vows, <S%H5088><s%> or all <S%H3605><s%> her bonds, <S%H632><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are on her: he confirms <S%H6965><s%> them, because <S%H3588><s%> he held <S%H2790><s%> his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> them.
But if <S%H518><s%> he shall any ways make them void <S%H6565><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that he has heard <S%H8085><s%> them; then he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> her iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> between <S%H996><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> and his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> being yet in her youth <S%H5271><s%> in her father's <S%H1><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
